INDUSTRIES

Aerial Data for Every Sector

We serve diverse industries with precision drone data solutions. From construction to agriculture, our aerial insights help you make better decisions, faster.

Construction

Who uses it

General contractors, project managers, developers

Use Cases

  • Progress monitoring across project phases
  • Detailed site surveys and layout planning
  • Stockpile volume calculations
  • As-built verification and documentation

Key Benefit

Track milestones and changes without disrupting active construction sites

Solar Energy

Who uses it

Solar developers, EPC firms, system integrators

Use Cases

  • Pre-installation site assessment and shading analysis
  • Thermal imaging for panel inspection and diagnostics
  • Layout planning and capacity optimization
  • Post-installation verification and performance monitoring

Key Benefit

Combined thermal and visual data for accurate pre and post-installation analysis

Get a Quote for Solar Energy

Roofing

Who uses it

Commercial roofers, roofing contractors, insurance adjusters

Use Cases

  • Precise roof measurements and square footage calculations
  • Damage documentation and condition assessment
  • Insurance claim evidence and photographic records
  • Accurate quotes without climbing or site visits

Key Benefit

Get accurate roof measurements and assessments without climbing or safety concerns

AGRICULTURAL FIELD AERIAL

Agriculture

Who uses it

Farm operators, agricultural consultants, precision ag specialists

Use Cases

  • NDVI crop health mapping and vegetation analysis
  • Multispectral and thermal imagery for crop monitoring
  • Drainage and irrigation planning from aerial perspective
  • Field boundary mapping and area calculations

Key Benefit

Make data-driven crop management decisions based on aerial intelligence

Get a Quote for Agriculture

Mining & Aggregates

Who uses it

Quarry operators, mine managers, aggregate producers

Use Cases

  • Volumetric surveys and stockpile calculations
  • High-precision site mapping and monitoring
  • Inventory tracking and material management
  • Regulatory compliance documentation

Key Benefit

Get accurate volumetric data without halting operations or manual surveys
